repos_data.description: Capstone disassembly/disassembler framework for ARM, ARM64 (ARMv8), BPF, Ethereum VM, M68K, M680X, Mips, MOS65XX, PPC, RISC-V(rv32G/rv64G), SH, Sparc, SystemZ, TMS320C64X, TriCore, Webassembly, XCore and X86.
C++ image processing and machine learning library with using of SIMD: SSE, AVX, AVX-512, AMX  for x86/x64, VMX(Altivec) and VSX(Power7) for PowerPC, NEON for ARM.
